name: DISCOVERING THE OLD SOUTH VIETNAM THROUGH VISITING INDEPENDENCE PALACE
description: When I was here at the first time, I went alone as I want to discover the history in my own way (Well, the truth is I cannot find anyone to go with me. Haha). Actually, I think I am quite bored when seeing so many pictures and reading the words putting on it. I believe that the best way to knowing the history is discussing with somebody else, especially someone comes from another culture.
